Error response
==============

+------------------+-------------------------------------+-----------------------------+
| Http status code | Response                            | Keterangan                  |
|                  |                                     |                             |
+------------------+-------------------------------------+-----------------------------+
| 410              | {                                   |                             |
|                  |                                     |                             |
|                  | “exception: “An e                   |                             |
|                  | x                                   |                             |
|                  | ception message”,                   |                             |
|                  |                                     |                             |
|                  | “message”: “Something bad happened” |                             |
|                  |                                     |                             |
|                  | }                                   |                             |
|                  |                                     |                             |
+------------------+-------------------------------------+-----------------------------+
| 415              | {                                   | Gagal memroses request data |
|                  |                                     |                             |
|                  | “exception: “”,                     |                             |
|                  |                                     |                             |
|                  | “message”: “                        |                             |
|                  | Failed to load request data         |                             |
|                  | ”                                   |                             |
|                  |                                     |                             |
|                  | }                                   |                             |
|                  |                                     |                             |
+------------------+-------------------------------------+-----------------------------+
